3.Install office.
2. Disable your Anti Virus
3. Run Microsoft Toolkit
4. Click on the Office 2013 icon on the bottom of Microsoft Toolkit when it opens (Bottom right. 1st icon).
5. Click on the Activation TAB.
6. Select AutoKMS from the drop down menu then click on the Activate TAB.
